forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog between 4am and 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. North northwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Downtown San Francisco, a slight chill enters the air, cloaked in an air of gentle tranquility. The patchy fog, a fleeting visitor between the hours of dawn, has yet to fully relinquish its hold, hovering just above the bay. Yet, the stars hint at a clear sky beyond the marine layer, suggesting that the day to come will bring forth moments of bright sunshine, tempered by the cooling embrace of the afternoon breeze. 

Tomorrow promises to unfold under mostly sunny skies, with the high reaching a comfortable 55 degrees, wrapping the city in an inviting warmth. As you venture out, consider layering, for the early chill will soon yield to a delicate warmth, ideal for a casual stroll along those iconic streets. The comings and goings of the city offer an allure; perhaps a quiet walk through the Presidio or a leisurely visit to one of the local bookstores would be the perfect dalliance. Each corner holds an invitation for the curious, and as the fog recedes into memory, a splendid day awaits those willing to embrace it.
